text: Swach Vidyalaya is an initiative of Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India to create a functional toilet in every school by 15 August 2015.Highlights of New Initiatives Taken by the Ministry of HRD Public sector units under 25 Ministries have pledged Rs. 400 crore for the campaign and private and public sector companies would be encouraged to build toilet blocks in schools. In visakha valley school health and physical education will conduct a cleaning program in the school. On 7-3-2019. == References == Category:Ministry of Education (India) Category:Sanitation Category:Schools in India
title: Swach Vidyalaya
